project.description: Run the Geppetto test suite on a private build (i.e. one that you've built yourself). Can also be used to test a central build, for comparison purposes.

hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.name: Build
hudson.model.RunParameterDefinition.description: A central build, if you don't want to use PrivateBuildURL below.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PrivateBuildURL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
The URL that the VPX and associated scripts can be downloaded from. Should be the subdirectory that contains os-vpx.xva or os-vpx-devel.xva, install-os-vpx.sh, etc.
If you want to use a central build instead, use Build above.

org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.name: SiteLabel
org.jvnet.jenkins.plugins.nodelabelparam.description:
One of "cambourne", "cambridge", "santa-clara", or "redmond".
Make sure that this matches the PrivateBuildURL parameter above! If you get this wrong, then you will end up streaming VM images from one site to another, and the build will time out.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Server
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This will completely wipe the specified machine! Leave blank to use the default test machine on the specified site. Use ssh-upload-jenkins-keys from root@openstack-jenkins.uk.xensource.com to allow remote login.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Password
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer root password. Leave blank to use the default site password.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Devel
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether to use the os-vpx-devel build, as opposed to the release build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: XSManagementNIC
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The XenServer NIC on which to create the Single-Server Private Network.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ManagementNetwork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The network or bridge to use for management traffic (i.e. eth1 in the VPX).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PublicNetwork
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The network or bridge to use for public traffic (i.e. eth2 in the VPX).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NetworkingMode
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Network manager to employ. Adding the "-ha" suffix to the manager specifies HA networking configuration.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GuestNetworkBridge
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The host bridge to be used for instance networking.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MasterBootOptions
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Boot options (aka kernel arguments) to be passed to the master VPX. It defaults to MASTER_BOOT_OPTIONS var set by site files.
